description.oldValue:
Official leaders can create ‘announcement’ storyline posts that reach their audience directly in email and Teams notifications. Post on behalf of another user allows the user to assign a delegate who can post to their storyline on their behalf.
GA date: February CY2023
description.newValue: Official leaders can create ‘announcement’ storyline posts that reach their audience directly in email and Teams notifications.  Post on behalf of another user allows the user to assign a delegate who can post to their storyline on their behalf.
